Warnings
  • Static Error: prompt:///:1,39: The called signature: tree(list[Figure], list[Edge], FProperty, FProperty),
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/tree

Function Figure tree(Figures nodes, list[Edge] edges, FProperty props...)
Description tree takes a list of nodes and a list of edges and draws a tree. The nodes can be arbitrary figures that should have a name (using the id property). The edges determine connections between named nodes.

The following constraints apply:
  1. All nodes should have an id property with a unique value.
  2. All edges should refer to ids that are defined by the nodes.
  3. The nodes and edges should form a tree, i.e., a single rooted, acyclic graph.
Examples Static Error: prompt:///:1,39: The called signature: tree(list[Figure], list[Edge], FProperty, FProperty),
nodes = [ box(id("A"), fillColor("green")),
     	  box(id("B"), fillColor("red")),
     	  box(id("C"), fillColor("blue"))
     	];
edges = [ edge("A", "B"),
          edge("A", "C")
    	];
render(tree(nodes, edges, gap(20), size(50)));
